General.Name: Thai Packaging & Printing Public Company Limited
General.Description: Thai Packaging & Printing Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in manufacture and distribution of box packaging products in Thailand. It offers corrugated boxed and white paper printed products in offset designs for various segments, including automotive, electric, medical appliance, food and beverage, houseware, fast-moving consumer, toy, and miscellaneous. Thai Packaging & Printing Public Company Limited was founded in 1983 and is based in Bang Phli, Thailand.
General.Address: 9/9 Moo.6 King-Kaew Rd., Bang Phli, Thailand, 10540
